eu.amidst.core.inference.messagepassing

Class Message<E extends Vector>

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.amidst.core.inference.messagepassing.Message<E>

  • public class Message<E extends Vector>
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles and defines the message passed between the Nodes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Creates a new Message for a given Node object.

      • combine

        public static <E extends Vector> Message<E> combine(Message<E> m1,
                                                    Message<E> m2)
        Combines two given Messages.
        Type Parameters:
        E - a class extending Vector
        Parameters:
        m1 - a first given message.
        m2 - a second given message.
        Returns:
